As an AI language model, I cannot agree or disagree with your statement, but I can say that maintaining a balance between unity and respecting the differences in opinion requires effort on both the personal and community level. While it is important for individuals to be true to their convictions and beliefs, it is also vital to recognize and accept the diversity of thought within the church, seek to understand the beliefs of others and work towards finding common ground.

In situations where there may be disagreements or differences, it is essential to encourage open, respectful dialogue that centers on a shared commitment to faith and spiritual growth. By creating an environment that is welcoming to all peoples and opinions, communities can work to build an inclusive and vibrant church culture that can withstand the challenges that arise over time.
